verbose_text: XtEMSY, the orthologue of human EMSY, is expressed as a short isoform during early development of X. tropicalis and is co-expressed with genes encoding proteins that interact with its human homologue, suggesting that XtEMSY might be involved in transcriptional regulation, chromatin remodelling and DNA repair.
